# tf.contrib.keras.layers.average

### `tf.contrib.keras.layers.average`

``` python
average(
    inputs,
    **kwargs
)
```



Defined in [`tensorflow/contrib/keras/python/keras/layers/merge.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.1/tensorflow/contrib/keras/python/keras/layers/merge.py).

Functional interface to the `Average` layer.

#### Arguments:

    inputs: A list of input tensors (at least 2).
    **kwargs: Standard layer keyword arguments.


#### Returns:

    A tensor, the average of the inputs.
